title: Bobby Shares Details About His New TV Show + We Get A Review from Listener Who Bought Lunchbox’s Valentine’s Day Reservation + Bobby Talks to ‘Coach Mike’ About Giving Him Basketball Lessons
itunes:title: Bobby Shares Details About His New TV Show + We Get A Review from Listener Who Bought Lunchbox’s Valentine’s Day Reservation + Bobby Talks to ‘Coach Mike’ About Giving Him Basketball Lessons
description:
Bobby talks about Jimmie Allen joining American Idol as a mentor and reveals new details about when his TV show will premiere. We talked to the listener who bought a reservation from Lunchbox for Valentine’s Day in Las Vegas. He gives us his review of the service. Amy shares an embarrassing moment she had on an airplane that made passengers have to get her attention. Bobby talks to ‘Coach Mike’ about possibly giving him basketball lessons. He is Eddie’s kids coach by the way…Also, a listener sent in an email ranking the looks of the guys on the show. So naturally, we had to read it and see where everyone fell.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
